tasks.name: Prompt wrapper contract alignment (code)
tasks.description: Update the browser-use prompt wrapper so stop conditions and completion are expressed via the `done` action (no conflicting alternate JSON schema).
acceptance_criteria: Prompt wrapper does not instruct a non-ActionModel JSON output schema.
Prompt wrapper explicitly instructs using a single `done` action for stop conditions and completion.
start_checklist: git checkout feat/browser-use-contract-alignment && git pull --ff-only
Read plan.md, tasks.json, session_log.md, A1-spec.md, kickoff_prompts/A1-code.md
Set A1-code status to in_progress in tasks.json
Add START entry to session_log.md; commit docs (docs: start A1-code)
git branch buca-a1-prompt-code feat/browser-use-contract-alignment
git worktree add wt/buca-a1-prompt-code buca-a1-prompt-code
Do not edit docs/tasks/session_log from the worktree
end_checklist: Update tasks.json and session_log.md on feat/browser-use-contract-alignment (docs: finish A1-code)

tasks.name: Prompt wrapper contract alignment (test)
tasks.description: Update/add deterministic tests asserting the prompt wrapper does not instruct alternate schemas and does instruct done-action semantics.
acceptance_criteria: Targeted pytest passes for the updated/added tests.

tasks.name: Pre-teardown screenshot guarantee (code)
tasks.description: Guarantee at least one step screenshot is captured before browser-use session teardown (especially on early aborts).
acceptance_criteria: Screenshot guarantee occurs pre-teardown via browser-use hooks/callbacks.

tasks.name: Persist agent/provider failures as run events (code)
tasks.description: Record LLM/provider/schema validation failures as `RunEventStore` error events (`event_type=agent`, `has_error=true`) so they persist into artifacts.
acceptance_criteria: LLM/provider/schema failures record a `has_error=true` agent run event.
